meta.learningGoals: <par>In this skill you learn to <term>bring an equation to the standard form</term> <inline-math/>. If you have an equation like <inline-math/> then you will be able to get <inline-math/> <skill-link>out of the denominator</skill-link>, <skill-link>expand all brackets</skill-link>, <skill-link>move all terms</skill-link> to the left and <skill-link>normalize</skill-link> the result to get <inline-math/>. The skill only deals with rational equations and not with equations with roots or other types of functions.</par>
